Pic: How long your life will be won't depend on your lifetime.
Description - can be same as pic: Life can seem short or life can seem long, depending on how you live it.

Pic: Do not seek safety. Give up, that's safety!
Description - can be same as pic: What we have to discover is that there is no safety, that seeking is painful, and that when we imagine that we have found it, we don’t like it.

Pic: Everything and nothing. This is what you are.
Description - can be same as pic: Love says ‘I am everything.’ Wisdom says ‘I am nothing’. Between the two, my life flows
